Total Cost of Revenue: policyholder benefits and claims incurred net

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes and operating joint ventures

Other Income (Expense): gain loss on sale of other investments
income loss from equity method investments
interest credited to policyholders account balances
market risk benefit change in fair value gain loss

Depreciation and Amortization: deferred policy acquisition cost amortization expense
Other Operating Expenses: operating expenses other than amortization of deferred policy acquisition costs

Other Comprehensive Income: other than temporary impairment losses investments portion in other comprehensive income loss before tax including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
portion of impairment loss recognized in other comprehensive income

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share

Total Revenues: revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax

__unmapped__: class b stock dividends per share declared
common stock dividends per share declared
earnings per class b share basic and diluted
income loss from continuing operations before equity method investments noncontrolling interest
income loss from continuing operations before operating joint ventures
income loss from continuing operations per basic and diluted class b share
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax per basic share
liability for future policy benefit expected future policy benefit derecognition
liability for future policy benefit expected future policy benefit increase decrease for other change
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest and redeemable noncontrolling ineterst
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes minority interest and income loss from equity method investments
